name: Catch The Bull And Don't Hurt Safta
name_original: Catch The Bull And Don't Hurt Safta
description:
Hola! Welcome to Catch The Bull And Don't Hurt Safta!

In this mini game, you take on the role of a Spanish matador tasked with catching bulls. But be careful not to accidentally hurt grandma who is also present in the arena! 

So grab your cape and get ready to show off your matador skills.

Controls:

mouse movement

---------------------------

Designer: Tomer Gazit

Guidance : Dani Bacon, Rutu Modan

 Art & Interaction course, Bezalel Academy of Art and design, 2022
